data.message: How are other questions being answered and mine from 5 days ago is being ignored? I even sent several messages. Need help!

replies.message: How can we help you, Robin? -Sarah

Husband has a timeline, Facebook said to change to a page. We tried and it keeps giving us errors. Says we cant use the same name so removed the dashes, figuring that is the issue and it says the name is not similar. We can't even log on to let everyone know if we make a separate page. I still get email notifications from the timeline though. He has several hundred friends he is going to lose.
Seriously? Can I at least get a reply back?  I see other replies about an hour ago. At least let me know if you are looking into it or not.

Hi Robin. If you have converted a personal account to a Page all of your friends and followers will transfer to the new Page. You can find more details on converting a Page here: http://on.fb.me/1jju01n Your husband will now be an admin of the Page and can access the Page through his personal account in a few easy steps. Learn how at: http://on.fb.me/1jju15j Please let me know if this helps. - Sarah

No, this does not help. I explained that we have tried to convert it and we keep getting errors. That is the problem we are having. First it says we cant use the same name, there are dashes in the name, we remove the dashes assuming that is the problem. Then it says we must pick a name that is similar. How much more similar can I get, same name no dashes. It wont let us get past  that point. We can't even sign on the personal account anymore. I know how to convert it, its your system that keeps giving me errors no matter what I do. That is what I need help with. My first comment clearly states this. Please help with this facebook system problem.
http://www.tremorgames.com/?ref=633841 play flash games and redeem free steam gifts/keys 100% WORKING!!!
Facebook -Sarah...any luck figuring out what the problem is with Facebook and my timeline????
